x1.25 if DIABOLIST with align<=-750, x1.15 if DIABOLIST with higher align, x1.1 if non-diabolist with align<=-750

damage.notes: Special case - evades normal immunity checks, reduction=yes

damage.max_damage: 110 base (from 8d6+9 online), modified by victim alignment

damage.scaling: More damage if caster is good-aligned

damage.special_effects: Knocks victims down unless flying or high DEX
Can banish demons instantly if align>=990 and skill-victim_level>30
damage.self_damage: Caster loses dam/50 HP and dam/10 MV
damage.requirements: Only affects demons, caster must have align>=400

damage.max_damage: 80 for neutral (from 8d9+8 online), modified by INT

damage.formula: sorcerer_single_target / 3, x2 if charmed by PC master
sorcerer_single_target(SPELL_FRACTURE) / 2, x2 if charmed by PC master

damage.notes: Area effect, needs unique effect to be worth casting over other ice spells

mechanics.description: Charms victim to follow and obey caster

mechanics.implementation: Delayed cast event with multiple ticks

Causes victim to degenerate over time
